yapanaya kolombuthureyi hindu widyalaya asala eeye (15) paswaru athbombayak pupura yamen lamayin dedeneku miyagos thawath hayadeneku thuwala laba atha.thuwala labu lamayin hayadena yapanaya rohalata athulath kara thibe.kolombuthureyi pasala asala margaye thibi kuda lamayin athbombayak ahulagena athi bawath eya melesa pupura gos athi bawath polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari krishantha jayakodi mahatha sandahan keleya.athbombaya wisikarana lesa wadihiti pudgalayeku lamayinta prakasha kara athi athara bombaya wisi karanawath samangama melesa pupura gos athayi polisiya pawasayi.

awurudu 19n pahala shri lanka pila saha engalanthaye 19n pahala kandayama athara engalanthaye dii pawathi siwudina palamu test tharagayen lakunu 199ka wishishta jayak wartha kirimata shri lanka pila samathwiya.me tharagaye di thun iriyawwen supiri daskam dakwimata shri lanka pile nayaka chathura piris samath wu athara kith ruwan withanage, bhanuka rajapaksha, denuwan rajakaruna saha santha da mal da dakshatha dakwimata samathwuha.shri lanka pila palamu inima 287 (84.4) kith ruwan withanage 52, chathura piris nodawi 46, bhanuka rajapaksha 45, denuwan rajakaruna 44 (mat dun 50/4, lewis gregari 39/3) saha dewani inima 367/9 (107.2) bhanuka rajapaksha 97, chathura piris 66, kith ruwan withanage 48, denuwan rajakaruna 45 (jo rut 20/3)engalantha pila palamu inima - 286 (82.1) athik jawid 90, asim rafik 82, (chathura piris 44/5, charith jayampathi 94/3) saha dewani inima 169 (62.1) jak manuwel 39 (santha da mal 43/4, nadira rajaguru 51/3)dewani tharagaya heta (27) aarambha wimata niyamithaya.
